action.action-desc: Mr. Filner introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Veterans’ Affairs

form.official-title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to provide for an increase in the amount of the reporting fees payable to educational institutions that enroll veterans receiving educational assistance from the Department of Veterans Affairs, and for other purposes.

section.header: Increase in amount of reporting fee payable to educational institutions that enroll veterans receiving educational assistance

subsection.text: Subsection (c) of section 3684 of title 38, United States Code, is amended—
Subsection (a) of such section is amended by striking the second comma after 34.
The amendments made by subsections (a) and (b) shall take effect on the date that is 90 days after the date of the enactment of this Act.
